features_implemented.details: V8 checkPhaseFieldProtection() implemented per design spec: phase index regression check (FR-01), phase status regression check (FR-02), fail-open (FR-03), Write-only (FR-04), execution order V7->V8->V1-V3 (FR-05)

unit_test_coverage.details: 67 tests total (31 existing + 36 new V8), all passing. 36 new tests cover all 23 ACs.

all_tests_passing.details: 67/67 state-write-validator tests pass. 1112/1112 full CJS hook suite pass. 489/490 ESM (1 pre-existing TC-E09 failure unrelated).

code_follows_standards.details: Follows existing CJS patterns, CommonJS exports, consistent error handling, JSDoc comments

implementation_matches_design.details: V8 function signature, insertion point, fail-open behavior, and block messages match requirements-spec.md and trace-analysis.md exactly

code_documentation.details: JSDoc on checkPhaseFieldProtection(), PHASE_STATUS_ORDINAL, inline AC traceability comments, implementation-notes.md
